isOnLocalNetwork().Description: Returns true if this @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#CastDevice_E@ is on the local network.

Returns: true if the device IDs are the same, else false.
isSameDevice(com.google.android.gms.cast.Description: Tests if this device refers to the same physical Cast device as castDevice. Two @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#CastDevice_E@s are considered to refer to the same physical device if they have the same device ID.

getFriendlyName().Description: Gets the friendly name for the device.

getIcons().Description: Returns a list of all of the device's icons. If there are no images, returns an empty list.

Parameters: The capability to test for. The expected value is one of the following constants: @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#CastDevice#CAPABILITY_AUDIO_IN_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#CastDevice#CAPABILITY_AUDIO_OUT_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#CastDevice#CAPABILITY_VIDEO_IN_E@, or @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#CastDevice#CAPABILITY_VIDEO_OUT_E@.
hasCapability(int).Description: Tests if the device supports a given capability.

toString().Description: Returns a string representation of the device.

getDeviceId().Description: Gets the unique ID for the device.

Parameters: The set capabilities for which to test. The expected value is one or more of the following constants: @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#CastDevice#CAPABILITY_AUDIO_IN_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#CastDevice#CAPABILITY_AUDIO_OUT_E@, @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#CastDevice#CAPABILITY_VIDEO_IN_E@, or @B_com#google#android#gms#cast#CastDevice#CAPABILITY_VIDEO_OUT_E@.
